attributes.additional_details:
There is a growing dislike for the current government and the direction it is talking.

If we live in a Democracy and Democratic values are held by the party in power and other party's which were voted in by a democratic vote. If it's people demand a early general election the only democratic move forward is to start the process to do so.
attributes.background:
A vote should take place in the House of Commons like in 2017. Under Section 2 of the Fixed-term Parliaments Act 2011

There should be an early parliamentary general election

If 434 MP's out of 650 MP'S vote yes the UK public will have a chance to redirect the country in a direction it wants.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
